derivation.yuyuan_name: Latin, from passus 'scattered', from the verb pandere

entry.tran: 到处，处处（用于索引或注释，表示某一名称或问题在文章或某一章节中多次出现）
entry.def: In indexes and notes, passim indicates that a particular name or subject occurs frequently throughout a particular piece of writing or section of a book.

example.ex: ...The Theories of their Relation (London, 1873), p. 8 and passim.
example.tran: 《论它们之间的关系》（伦敦，1873），第8页及其他各章节。

means.word_mean: 1. used to refer to cited works
